newsitem.title: USA: Northwest Air January load factor up.
newsitem.headline: Northwest Air January load factor up.

text.p: Northwest Airlines Inc said Thursday its systemwide passenger load factor in January rose 1.5 points to 67.4 percent from 65.9 percent.
Domestic load factor for the month gained 0.2 points to 62.3 percent from 62.1 percent. International load factor rose 3.8 points to 75.4 percent from 71.6 percent.
Systemwide, Northwest said its January available seat miles rose 4.6 percent to 7.75 billion from 7.42 billion. Revenue passenger miles gained seven percent to 5.22 billion from 4.88 billion.
Cargo ton miles for the month gained 2.6 percent to 156.2 million from 152.3 million.
